<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_soap_message_function</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sys_soap_message_function">ws_security_username_profileISNOTEMPTY^ws_security_typeNOT LIKE2105f20ed7101200b93ca5f75e61032c^NQws_security_x509_profileISNOTEMPTY^ws_security_typeNOT LIKE46f4f20ed7101200b93ca5f75e61030f^EQ<item endquery="false" field="ws_security_username_profile" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="ws_security_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="NOT LIKE" or="false" value="2105f20ed7101200b93ca5f75e61032c"/> <item endquery="false" field="ws_security_x509_profile" goto="false" newquery="true" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="ws_security_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="NOT LIKE" or="false" value="46f4f20ed7101200b93ca5f75e61030f"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Clear profile on remove WS-Security type</name> <order>200</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var x509SysId = new ChoiceListHelper("sys_soap_message_function", "ws_security_type").getChoiceSysId("X.509"); var userNameSysId = new ChoiceListHelper("sys_soap_message_function", "ws_security_type").getChoiceSysId("Username");
// case: remove X.509 then clear X.509 profile if (!gs.nil(current.ws_security_x509_profile) && current.ws_security_type.indexOf(x509SysId) == -1) { current.ws_security_x509_profile = ""; current.use_ws_security = false; }
// case: remove Username then clear Username profile if (!gs.nil(current.ws_security_username_profile) && current.ws_security_type.indexOf(userNameSysId) == -1) { current.ws_security_username_profile = ""; }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-01-14 15:15:39</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>03457988d7011200b93ca5f75e610320</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Clear profile on remove WS-Security type</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Web Service Consumer" source="com.glide.web_service_consumer">9253f8a03c31311068bcf327dfe37f67</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_03457988d7011200b93ca5f75e610320</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-01-14 17:37:58</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=03457988d7011200b93ca5f75e610320"/> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Clear profile on remove WS-Security type
